courses.title: QR Code Scanning for ISL Translation
courses.slug: QR Code Scanning for ISL Translation
courses.description: Allows users to scan QR codes placed in various locations like exhibits and information boards to display ISL translations of complex content, making information accessible and understandable through sign language videos.

courses.title: Augmented Reality (AR) Integration
courses.description: Enhances ISL experiences by overlaying sign language animations onto the physical environment, making learning interactive and engaging through animated avatars performing ISL gestures in real time.

courses.title: Multi-Modal Input for ISL Conversion
courses.description: Supports audio, text, and video inputs to generate real-time ISL gestures. The app also converts ISL gestures into text and speech, enabling two-way communication.

courses.title: User-Friendly and Accessible Interface
courses.description: Features an intuitive interface with customizable options for avatar size, speed, and display style, tailored to the needs of the deaf community.

courses.title: Multi-Language Support
courses.description: Supports translations from English and other Indian languages into ISL, catering to regional variations of sign language.

courses.title: Application Scenarios
courses.description: Applicable in science centers, museums, educational institutions, and public services, providing ISL translations of scientific explanations, classroom resources, and public announcements.

courses.title: Building RESTful APIs with Node.js
courses.description: Learn how to build powerful and scalable RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.

courses.title: Modern JavaScript ES6+
courses.description: Unlock the full potential of modern JavaScript with ES6+ features and beyond.

courses.title: Version Control with Git & GitHub
courses.description: Explore the essentials of version control with Git and collaborate with others using GitHub.

courses.title: Advanced CSS Techniques
courses.description: Discover advanced CSS techniques, including Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design principles.
